name: markdown-editor-optimized
description: Minimal VS Code custom editor with an empty Bun-built webview.

commands.title: Markdown Editor Optimized: Open With Editor

scripts.build: bun run build:webview && bun run build:extension
scripts.build:webview: mkdir -p webview/dist && bun build webview/src/index.js --outfile webview/dist/index.js --target=browser --minify
scripts.watch:webview: mkdir -p webview/dist && bun build webview/src/index.js --outfile webview/dist/index.js --target=browser --minify --watch
